compassion and care of our patients With the expertise and knowledge of our international partners, we bring global standards, in the field of single specialty clinics Apollo Sugar is an equal opportunity employer and promotes diversity in our workforce If you are compassionate with a flair for service excellence that you think can provide healing touch to improve the lives of people around you, Apollo Sugar is the place for you Join our team to leverage career opportunities and achieve long term success Our talent pool comprises of specialists in Medical Services, Marketing, Finance, HR, IT, Operations & Quality domain In our clinics operation, we endeavor to impart quality experience to our multi-disciplinary care specialists comprising Endocrinologists, Diabetologists, Operations Incharges, Patient Care Facilitators, Diabetes Specialist Nurses, Dieticians, Diabetic Educators, and Sales & Marketing lead's with meaningful assignments to enhance their skills and expertise at par with global standards To know more about your career options, connect with Apollo Sugar HR Partners and discover how successful you can be with us More About Apollo Sugar (read more at wwwapollosugarcom) India is home to over 65 million diabetics and more than 50 million pre-diabetics More than 30 million Indians are unknown diabetics (not yet diagnosed but afflicted) The need of the hour is to address this endemic with a dedicated, comprehensive model of care -
